title: Fix workflow — severity groups with checkpoints
query: Run an accessibility audit on https://example.com and fix the issues
expected_behavior: Completes page discovery (Step 1), runs the audit (Step 2), and presents findings (Step 3)
After user approves, applies Critical fixes first (4a) — structural/semantic only
Stops at checkpoint after Critical fixes — lists files modified and asks user to verify
Does NOT proceed to High fixes until user confirms
Repeats apply-checkpoint cycle for High, Medium, Low
Presents style-dependent fixes (4b) as a separate batch with exact proposed changes
Does NOT apply style changes without explicit approval
Processes source code patterns (4c) — greps project source for regex matches and presents confirmed findings with proposed fixes
Runs verification re-audit (Step 5) after all fixes
Delivers results (Step 6) with summary, manual checklist, and closing message
